vlm_hint.genericity_hint: The caption is too generic and does not specify the exact objects in the image.
edit_instructions: Please provide a more specific caption that includes all the objects in the image.
vlm_hint.raw:
system

Rule 2: Never provide a correct caption or a full description of the image.
Give minimal hints only.
Return JSON with keys:
missing_objects, hallucinated_objects, genericity_hint, edit_instructions, score (0-10)
No other keys.
